topic.title: Submissions
topic.section:
The Active Submissions page can be found in the Reviewer's User Home page. This page contains a list of the submissions assigned to that Reviewer for review. The Reviewer can complete a review by clicking on an active submission title and following the subsequent steps.

All completed submission reviews are listed under the Archive page, with the submission title and its reviewer recommendation and director decision listed. Detailed review information can be reached by clicking on the title.
